Again, my apologies. Thank you for your understanding as we make this transition.

Building bridges together,
Melissa Goff

If students are in their virtual classrooms, they should stay logged in (don’t log out). If they haven’t been able to log in, they should completely log out of their Chromebook and log back into the Chromebook every 30 minutes.

Si los estudiantes están en sus salones de clase virtuales, deben permanecer conectados (no desconectarse). Si no han podido iniciar sesión, deben cerrar la sesión por completo de su Chromebook y volver a iniciar sesión en la Chromebook cada 30 minutos.

post_text: We mourn the loss of Katherine Johnson, one of the trailblazing African-American women celebrated in the book and film ‘Hidden Figures’, who died today at the age of 101. Johnson was a pioneer among women and African-Americans in the fields of STEM, as she calculated by hand the flight path for America’s first space mission and first landing on the moon. We remember and honor her as we recognize Black History Month.

January 11 at 7:35 PM · Albany, OR ·

SAHS Fire Restoration |
Restoration efforts at South Albany High School are still going strong! ServPro is diligently working towards the return of building access to SAHS students. In the existing gym, you can see cleanup efforts in process and the removal of temporary protection from the wooden floors. As the district planned the return of students to this building, it was determined that temporary heat would be necessary. To resolve this, ServPro set up temporary ducting; these ducts are connected to a combination of electric & natural gas heaters and desiccants (machines that dehumidify the air), in order to heat the spaces as efficiently as possible.
